question: Who is the first author of the cited paper that is revelant to "And yet, even in clean samples with robust magnetic order, the zerofield neutron spectrum which measures the dynamic spin correlations shows a diffuse continuum instead of sharp magnon modes typically seen in wellordered magnets"?
